mapper.select:
SELECT pro.id , pro.order_id, FROM_UNIXTIME(ord.order_time,"%Y/%m/%d") order_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( venue_sch.venue_day,"%Y/%m/%d") venue_day, FROM_UNIXTIME(plan_sch.staff_day,"%Y/%m/%d") staff_day, ord.kz_name, ord.kz_phone, ord.mate_name, ord.mate_phone, ord.srctype, ord.address, ord.child_name, ord.type, ord.age, ord.order_memo, ord.sex, ord.sale_id, ord.marry_time, ord.birth_day, ord.collector_name, venue_sch.venue_id , meal.id meal_id , meal.meal_name , pro.order_type , staff_sch1.id shoot_id, staff1.NICKNAME shoot_name, staff_sch2.id makeup_id, staff2.NICKNAME makeup_name, staff3.Nickname video_name, GROUP_CONCAT(sence_sch.id SEPARATOR ',') shootRoomId FROM hm_erp_order ord LEFT JOIN hm_erp_meal meal ON ord.meal_id = meal.id AND ord.company_id = meal.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_order_process pro ON ord.id = pro.order_id AND ord.company_id = pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_process_shoot_schedule shoot_pro ON shoot_pro.process_id = pro.id AND shoot_pro.company_id = pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_process_scene_schedule sence_pro ON sence_pro.process_id = pro.id AND sence_pro.company_id = pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_plan_schedule plan_sch ON shoot_pro.plan_schedule_id = plan_sch.id AND shoot_pro.company_id = plan_sch.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_scene_schedule sence_sch ON sence_sch.id = sence_pro.shoot_schedule_id AND sence_sch.company_id = sence_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue_schedule venue_sch ON venue_sch.id = shoot_pro.venue_schedule_id AND venue_sch.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_makeup_room_schedule makeup_room_sch ON makeup_room_sch.id = shoot_pro.makeup_room_schedule_id AND makeup_room_sch.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_staff_schedule staff_sch1 ON staff_sch1.id = shoot_pro.shoot_schedule_id AND staff_sch1.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_staff_schedule staff_sch2 ON staff_sch2.id = shoot_pro.makeup_schedule_id AND staff_sch2.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_staff_schedule staff_sch3 ON staff_sch2.id = shoot_pro.video_schedule_id AND staff_sch3.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff staff1 ON staff1.ID = staff_sch1.staff_id AND staff1.COMPANYID = staff_sch1.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff staff2 ON staff2.ID = staff_sch2.staff_id AND staff2.COMPANYID = staff_sch2.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff staff3 ON staff3.ID = staff_sch3.staff_id AND staff3.COMPANYID = staff_sch3.company_id WHERE ord.company_id =#{companyId}
and venue_sch.venue_day BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
and ord.order_time BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
and plan_sch.staff_day BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
and staff_sch1.id in (${shootId})
and staff_sch2.id in (${makeupId})
and pro.order_type in (${orderType})
and meal.id in (${mealIds})
and shoot_pro.venue_schedule_id is null
and shoot_pro.plan_schedule_id is null
and (shoot_pro.makeup_schedule_id is null or shoot_pro.shoot_schedule_id is null )
and sence_pro.shoot_schedule_id is null
and shoot_pro.makeup_room_schedule_id is null
GROUP BY pro.id, sence_pro.shoot_schedule_id

SELECT pro.order_id, ord.order_num, ord.meal_id, meal.meal_name, ord.company_id, ord.sale_id, staff.NICKNAME, ord.kz_name, ord.kz_phone, ord.mate_name, ord.mate_phone, ord.address, ord.order_memo, FROM_UNIXTIME(ord.order_time, "%Y/%m/%d") order_time, FROM_UNIXTIME(ord.marry_time, "%Y/%m/%d") marry_time, ord.child_name, FROM_UNIXTIME(ord.birth_day, "%Y/%m/%d") birth_day, ord.age, ord.sex, pro.order_type, pro.id pro_id, ord.srctype, scene_sch.scene_id, scene.scene_name, scene_sch.start_time, scene_sch.end_time, scene_pro.shoot_schedule_id shoot_room_schedule_id, shoot_pro.makeup_room_schedule_id, room.room_name makeupRoomName, shoot_pro.makeup_schedule_id, staff2.NICKNAME makeupName, shoot_pro.plan_schedule_id, staff3.NICKNAME planName, shoot_pro.shoot_schedule_id, staff1.NICKNAME shootName, shoot_pro.venue_schedule_id, CONCAT( venue.venue_name, '/', service.service_name ) venueName, meal.clothes_num, FROM_UNIXTIME( venue_sch.venue_day, "%Y/%m/%d" ) venue_day, venue_sch.venue_id, venue_sch.service_id, plan_sch.staff_day planTime FROM hm_erp_order ord LEFT JOIN hm_erp_order_process pro ON pro.order_id = ord.id AND pro.company_id = ord.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_process_scene_schedule scene_pro ON scene_pro.process_id = pro.id AND scene_pro.company_id = pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_process_shoot_schedule shoot_pro ON shoot_pro.process_id = pro.id AND shoot_pro.company_id = pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_makeup_room_schedule makeup_room_sch ON makeup_room_sch.id = shoot_pro.makeup_room_schedule_id AND makeup_room_sch.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue_room room ON room.room_id = makeup_room_sch.makeup_room_id AND room.company_id = makeup_room_sch.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue_schedule venue_sch ON venue_sch.id = shoot_pro.venue_schedule_id AND venue_sch.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue venue ON venue_sch.venue_id = venue.id AND venue_sch.company_id = venue.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service service ON service.id = venue_sch.service_id AND service.company_id = venue_sch.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_meal meal ON meal.id = ord.meal_id AND meal.company_id = ord.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_scene_schedule scene_sch ON scene_sch.id = scene_pro.shoot_schedule_id AND scene_sch.company_id = scene_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_scene scene ON scene_sch.scene_id = scene.id AND scene.company_id = scene_sch.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff staff ON staff.id = ord.sale_id AND staff.COMPANYID = ord.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_staff_schedule staff_sch1 ON staff_sch1.id = shoot_pro.shoot_schedule_id AND staff_sch1.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_staff_schedule staff_sch2 ON staff_sch2.id =shoot_pro.makeup_schedule_id AND staff_sch2.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff staff1 ON staff1.ID = staff_sch1.staff_id AND staff1.COMPANYID = staff_sch1.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff staff2 ON staff2.ID = staff_sch2.staff_id AND staff2.COMPANYID = staff_sch2.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_plan_schedule plan_sch ON plan_sch.id = shoot_pro.plan_schedule_id AND plan_sch.company_id = shoot_pro.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff staff3 ON staff3.id = plan_sch.staff_id AND plan_sch.company_id = staff3.companyId where ord.id=#{orderId} and ord.company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.update: update hm_erp_order set order_num=#{orderNum} where id=#{id}

UPDATE hm_erp_process_shoot_schedule SET venue_schedule_id =#{venueSchId}, makeup_room_schedule_id =#{makeupRoomSchId}, makeup_schedule_id =#{makeupSchId}, shoot_schedule_id =#{shootSchId}, plan_schedule_id =#{planSchId} where process_id= #{proId} and company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.delete: delete from hm_erp_process_scene_schedule where process_id=#{proId} and company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.update: UPDATE hm_erp_order SET sale_id = #{saleId}, order_time = #{orderTime}, srctype = #{srcType}, kz_name = #{kzName}, kz_phone = #{kzPhone}, mate_name = #{mateName}, mate_phone = #{matePhone}, address = #{address}, marry_time = #{marryTime}, child_name = #{childName}, birth_day = #{birthday}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex} where company_id=#{companyId} and id=#{orderId}
